Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to reach 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average waiting time to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' after 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' for cases ending with 'Payment Handled'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time it takes 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to be followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average time it takes from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time it takes for 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to be followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Average time for 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases where the next activity is 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases leading to re-submission
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in successful cases (ending with 'Payment Handled')
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases that are eventually approved
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time for 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' in cases that require director's approval
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Minimum time from 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' in cases without rejections
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
